page_dicechamp_Tips1_text: Invite your friend to download Vova, when he/she successfully logs in, you will join the leaderboard automatically
page_dicechamp_Tips2_text: Improve your rank in the leaderboard by participating in the "Lucky Dice" game. The more you win, the higher your rank
page_dicechamp_Tips3_text: The leaderboard will take 5 minutes to refresh to update the rankings
page_dicechamp_Tips4_text: Each session lasts for 72 hours, the result will be published by the end of each session
page_dicechamp_Tips4_title: When do I get to know the result?
page_dicechamp_Tips5_text: If you win, a message will be sent to your Vova app.Follow the instructions to get your reward
page_dicechamp_Tips5_title: I got a cash reward, how to redeem？
page_dicechamp_share1_text: Share to get today's free bet! Win up to $10,000 after your friends join with you
page_dicechamp_share2_text: Get on board and get cash reward after one of your friends download vova app
page_dicechamp_share3_text: The more invitees you got, the higher your winning odds on $10,000
page_dicechampion_boardclosed_buttomexp: Get on board after you've invited a friend
page_freebies_updated_tip1: Our "Freebies" activity has been updated, the following are the main update points:
page_freebies_updated_tip2: You'll get more freebies: Invite a new user to join Vova and get up to 100 freebies. You can see the rules for more details.
page_freebies_updated_tip3: Price adjustment of items in the "Freebies" activity: Due to the price changes, your freebies that have not expired prior to the update will increase by 1:20 (you will get additional 19 freebies for each freebie you had before the update). The freebies you deserve will be sent to your account within 24 hours.
page_freebies_updated_tip4: If you have any problems participating in the "Freebies" activity, please feel free to contact us. You can update your Vova App to the latest version, and use the Live Chat service to contact us directly.
page_freebies_updating_tip1: In order to give you a better experience, we will optimize some details in the "Freebies", "Lucky Dice", and "Lucky Draw" activities. This optimization will enable you to get more freebies from Vova.
page_freebies_updating_tip2: Presently, these activities are being updated and it is expected to last for several minutes. During this period, you will be temporarily unable to visit these pages and we sincerely apologize for the inconveniences.
